title: syndra passive rework?
body: Just wondering if they is going to be an update on the syndra passive rework that was announced last year but has been postponed.....with the new mages update coming up, will syndra be a part of it or will it still be at a  later date{{champion:134}}

replies.body:
http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/red-posts-2201-mage-update-brand-cassiopeia-zyra-vladimir-malzahar-velkoz-state-of-syndra-xerath-ryze-swain-and-fiddlesticks-meddler-on-irelias-e-and-swain-and-more-55013/#2
looks like she might be on hold for a little bit, she is in a good state but i kinda just want a few tweaks to her q damage early and her passive as games now dont last long enough for her to reach max level on 3 or more of her abilities

can i find anyone else to ready their pitchforks at syndra buffs? apparently if changes are coming i could only hope for anything but regular passive buffs. that would be cancer. level 9 power spikes rito plz
If they're gonna do a mages rework, it would be stupid for Riot not to change Syndra's passive, especially since they were going to.
I've actually been waiting for some Syndra buffs for aaaaaagggggggeeeeeeeesssssss
from what i've been reading it's still in the works. but reading between the lines suggests that they'll push it out when they bring out the mage reworks later this yr
